metadata.dc:title: Antecedentes de la ciencia médica Mexicana a través de la figura del doctor Daniel Vergara Lope Escobar (1865-1938).
[Antecedents of Mexican medical science as seen through the figure of Dr. Daniel Vergara Lope Escobar (1865-1938)].
